metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0146 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Resource leak in i40e driver for Intel(R) Ethernet 700 Series Controllers versions before 2.8.43 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access.
